Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 13:45:49
Folder: CC2DJ3S - wellbeing support during challenging times
Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CC2DJ3S_00
From: Dany Nehme <Dany.Nehme@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-02 10:43
Subject: Wellbeing Support During Challenging Times
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Colleagues,

We hope you and your loved ones are safe and well. 

The ongoing events in Lebanon are affecting us all, and it’s important to show compassion and empathy for one another. During this period of uncertainty, we encourage everyone to prioritize their mental wellbeing and lean on the support available within our Group.

As we understand that the current situation brings up a range of emotions, we would like to introduce an Employee Assistance Programme - Talktime - that offers you free and confidential mental health therapy and counselling services. Talktime is  an online platform that connects you with licensed therapists and clinical psychologists to help you during these challenging times.

You can access the platform by following the below steps:

1.	Go to www.talktime.ae <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.talktime.ae%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1daf8725246e42374fc008dce2ad79af%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638634481922839688%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=YCU%2BmDkhd3uytCrqGAvCNwRSB%2B9GHs6nfifIeA3gJkY%3D&reserved=0> , click on “Sign Up”
2.

metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CC2DJ3S - wellbeing support during challenging times\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
88%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=YCU%2BmDkhd3uytCrqGAvCNwRSB%2B9GHs6nfifIeA3gJkY%3D&reserved=0> , click on “Sign Up”
2.	Select “My Company (Employee Benefits Code)”
3.	Insert “ChalhoubU” under Employee Benefits Code, then your corporate email address and “Start Therapy”
4.	Review your benefits and then click on “Get Started”
5.	Choose “Individual” and then click on “Continue”
6.	Select your primary reasons for using this service, then “Continue”
7.	Select your age group/gender, then “Continue”
8.	Choose your preferred therapist’ gender and language, then “Continue” 
9.	Set up your password and “Register” to create your account
10.	Check your email for a verification code and start your therapy journey.

 

Additional Support & Resources

*	Wellbeing Academy: explore articles, webinars, guides and workshops designed to provide guidance on self-compassion and managing stress, grief and anxiety via the Wellbeing Academy on Chalhoub University. You can access them here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchalhoubuniversity.com%2Fcourse%2Fview.php%3Fid%3D2729&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C1daf8725246e42374fc008dce2ad79af%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638634481922862424%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=Ty3C6VIFFdJvMfXrIb1tNMPP7kMJ5%2Bhqltq0FAJvRiU%3D&reserved=0> .
*	Online webinars: we have scheduled two exclusive sessions for Chalhoub Group team members on How to Cope with Collective Grief, Uncertainty, and Emotional Pain, on Thursday, 3rd and 10th October.

*	Online webinars: we have scheduled two exclusive sessions for Chalhoub Group team members on How to Cope with Collective Grief, Uncertainty, and Emotional Pain, on Thursday, 3rd and 10th October.

If you require additional support, please don’t hesitate to reach out to your manager or HR for any assistance.

In these challenging times, our thoughts are with you and your families. We hope for peace in Lebanon and the region. 

Take care and stay safe.

DANY NEHME​​​​	
VP ‑ HR OPERATIONS	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

ID: CC2DJ3S_01
From: Dany Nehme <Dany.Nehme@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-15 13:56
Subject: RE: Wellbeing Support During Challenging Times
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Colleagues,

I hope you and your loved ones are safe during these challenging times. 

Recognizing the weight of such circumstances, it's important to prioritize your mental health and wellbeing. With our Employee Assistance Programme, Talktime, you have access to free and confidential support from licensed therapists and clinical psychologists, available to you at any time.

To get started, visit www.talktime.ae <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.talktime.ae%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7803570c24784f585bc108dcecffa624%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645829998012327%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wTmxGDsDRiWfa6V193001RozqLMKnCOMc%2Fv7nf%2F1Dio%3D&reserved=0>  and use the code CHALHOUBU. Whether you're feeling stressed, anxious, or just need someone to talk to, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Additionally, I encourage you to explore the Wellbeing Academy <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchalhoubuniversity.com%2Fcourse%2Fview.php%3Fid%3D2729%26stoploop%3D0&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7803570c24784f585bc108dcecffa624%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645829998045669%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=wBct7MwQiuvmyuR7ZuUZviG1vVfiKfcq4G9VNhiZxjI%3D&reserved=0>  on Chalhoub University, where you’ll find articles, webinars, and workshops designed to help you manage stress, grief, and other challenges you might be going through.

We’re in this together. If you need any extra support, please reach out to your manager, HR, or a trusted colleague.. 

Take care and be kind to yourself.

 

 

DANY NEHME​​​​

From: Dany Nehme <Dany.Nehme@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: 02 October 2024 09:34
To: Dany Nehme <Dany.Nehme@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Wellbeing Support During Challenging Times

 

Dear Colleagues,

We hope you and your loved ones are safe and well. 

The ongoing events in Lebanon are affecting us all, and it’s important to show compassion and empathy for one another. During this period of uncertainty, we encourage everyone to prioritize their mental wellbeing and lean on the support available within our Group.

As we understand that the current situation brings up a range of emotions, we would like to introduce an Employee Assistance Programme - Talktime - that offers you free and confidential mental health therapy and counselling services. Talktime is  an online platform that connects you with licensed therapists and clinical psychologists to help you during these challenging times.

You can access the platform by following the below steps:

1.	Go to www.talktime.ae <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.talktime.ae%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7803570c24784f585bc108dcecffa624%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645829998159179%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=npqXAnN00fC1o4dPMN0MmvFI7xVaZkd04jSRL6wp8%2FA%3D&reserved=0> , click on “Sign Up”
2.	Select “My Company (Employee Benefits Code)”
3.

metadata.doc_id: CC2DJ3S - wellbeing support during challenging times\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CC2DJ3S - wellbeing support during challenging times\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Select “My Company (Employee Benefits Code)”
3.	Insert “ChalhoubU” under Employee Benefits Code, then your corporate email address and “Start Therapy”
4.	Review your benefits and then click on “Get Started”
5.	Choose “Individual” and then click on “Continue”
6.	Select your primary reasons for using this service, then “Continue”
7.	Select your age group/gender, then “Continue”
8.	Choose your preferred therapist’ gender and language, then “Continue” 
9.	Set up your password and “Register” to create your account
10.	Check your email for a verification code and start your therapy journey.

 

Additional Support & Resources

*	Wellbeing Academy: explore articles, webinars, guides and workshops designed to provide guidance on self-compassion and managing stress, grief and anxiety via the Wellbeing Academy on Chalhoub University. You can access them here <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchalhoubuniversity.com%2Fcourse%2Fview.php%3Fid%3D2729&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7C7803570c24784f585bc108dcecffa624%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638645829998171146%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=hn7zyoz%2FhRizUFKXN2dO%2B3tMiY8v%2Fw%2FOQzT5OT0DWYY%3D&reserved=0> .
*	Online webinars: we have scheduled two exclusive sessions for Chalhoub Group team members on How to Cope with Collective Grief, Uncertainty, and Emotional Pain, on Thursday, 3rd and 10th October.

If you require additional support, please don’t hesitate to reach out to your manager or HR for any assistance.

chunks.text:
If you require additional support, please don’t hesitate to reach out to your manager or HR for any assistance.

In these challenging times, our thoughts are with you and your families. We hope for peace in Lebanon and the region. 

Take care and stay safe.

 

DANY NEHME​​​​

VP ‑ HR OPERATIONS

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 804 5000
